Utilities

Class Topics

  • java.lang.Object
    • Utilities.Topics

  • public class Topics
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an object, Topics It has a title, a creation time, an id, a description, and an array list of questions
    Author:
    sae1

              java.lang.String title,
              java.lang.String id,
              java.lang.String time,
              java.util.ArrayList<Question> questions)
        Constructor a topic object
        Parameters:
        description - description of the topic
        title - the title of the topic
        id - id that corresponds to the topic
        time - time that the topic was created
        questions - questions that fall under this topic
